title: Bug after close the client.
body: after that i closed the client i couldnt open again the client.

replies.body: Did you check in your Task Manager to make sure that the League Client.exe wasn't still running?

Yeah, search for a zombie process running, if this keeps happening please fill a bug report.

A zombie app can be described as a program that doesn't show up visually, but is still running in the background. You can check by opening the task manager in Windows.
I've encountered this before, but never knew it had a name. Thank you (Riot A Huevo) for giving me another word to bother my friends with.
